Title: ↩️ ❗️Basic information about the requirements for mining: ▪️Indiv...
Description: TASS: The Russian Cabinet of Ministers will be able to introduce a ban on cryptocurrency mining in certain regions and territories if there is a risk of electricity shortage. ❗️Basic information about the requirements for mining:▪️Individual entrepreneurs will be able to mine after being included in the special register of the Federal Tax Service;▪️Russians without individual entrepreneurs will also be able to mine, but within the limits of 6 thousand kWh per month. If the limit is exceeded, an individual entrepreneur must be registered;▪️Miners are required to inform the Federal Tax Service how much digital currency they were able to 'mine', as well as to which address-identifier it was credited. These addresses will be available only to law enforcement agencies;▪️Miners are required to ensure the reliability, uninterruption and protection of the services provided, and monitor a stable power supply;▪️The register of miners and mining infrastructure operators will be maintained according to the rules approved by the Cabinet of Ministers. Government agencies, the Central Bank, local network organizations and energy systems will be able to receive information from the registers;▪️Miners laundering funds, as well as bankrupts and those who mine in prohibited territories will be excluded from the register;▪️The government can limit mining in certain territories. This may be due to the risk of electricity shortage;▪️The decision on the limitation will be made at the proposal of the Electric Power Industry Development Commission, if the Ministry of Energy or the regions contacts it.

Bezuglaya claimed that he deliberately assigned the weakest brigade in terms of staffing to repel the offensive of the Russian Armed Forces near Kharkov, stated that he 'drank in a restaurant' in Odessa during the missed breakthrough to Dzerzhinsk (Ukrainian name - Toretsk). Sodol had previously been criticized by the military and deputies for large losses of personnel and loss of territory.

Title: ↩️ Problems with access to the Steam gaming service are the respo...
Description: TASS: Steam malfunctions are being recorded in Russia. Over the past 24 hours, more than 5.3 thousand users reported errors, according to data from the Downdetector portal. Users complain about the crash of the website, mobile application and general failure, as well as problems... Problems with access to the Steam gaming service are the responsibility of the digital platform itself, there is no intervention from Roskomnadzor. Deputy Chairman of the State Duma Committee on Information Policy Anton Gorelkin reported this to TASS.

Title: ↩️ ⚖️ The court arrested Chkalov's great-granddaughter Daria Bogd...

Title: Microsoft announced that as of October 14, 2025 it will no longer...
Description: Microsoft announced that it will stop supporting the Windows 10 operating system for free starting October 14, 2025. Individuals will be able to extend support for a year for $30, the cost of the first additional year of support for legal entities will be $61, the second - $122, and the third - $244, reported The portal Verge.

Title: ↩️ Ukrainian military registration and enlistment offices have ma...
Description: TASS: Employees of Ukrainian military registration and enlistment offices move around Kyiv in cars with private license plates; cases of forced mobilization have increased. This is a real hunt for people, eyewitnesses told TASS. Raids are taking place throughout the city, as well as at the entrance to Kyiv... Ukrainian military registration and enlistment offices have maximally intensified the work of mobilizing citizens due to the shortage of infantry at the front and want to mobilize about 200-300 thousand more people. This was stated by Ukrainian Armed Forces serviceman Evgeniy Ievlev on the air of the Kyiv 24 TV channel.

Title: Turkey plans to adopt a law on foreign agents. Bloomberg reported...
Description: Turkey plans to adopt a law on foreign agents. This was reported by Bloomberg. According to its information, the law will be aimed at countering those who work against 'the security of the state or its internal and external political interests' under the influence or on the orders of another country or foreign organization. The penalty for violating the law is up to seven years in prison.

Title: Two works by Andy Warhol stolen from the Dutch art gallery MPV in...
Description: Two works by Andy Warhol have been stolen from the Dutch art gallery MPV in Oisterwijk. Two more works of art were stolen but then thrown out on the street, NOS TV channel reported. The incident occurred at night. The attackers used powerful explosives and the blast wave broke the front door, as well as many of the gallery's windows. In addition, windows were broken in a number of other houses on the street.

Title: ❗️Rostec is launching a pilot project for issuing digital signatu...
Description: ❗️From November 1, Rostec is launching a pilot project to issue digital signatures to Russian citizens abroad, the state corporation said in a statement. The purpose of the experiment is to give citizens of the Russian Federation the opportunity to receive government services remotely, including through the Gosuslugi portal. Rossotrudnichestvo and TASS are responsible for information support of the project and the development of digital services for compatriots. Among these is the portal 'Map 'Motherland', where the most complete information is collected on one resource, as well as a news agenda for those who want to return to their historical homeland.

He is suspected of committing a number of serious and especially serious crimes; ▪️Marines of the Black Sea Fleet destroyed armored vehicles of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the Kursk border region. Thanks to the active actions of the Marines, the enemy suffers losses and retreats every day.

Title: ↩️Preliminary election results in Georgia: ▪️Turnout was 58.94%. ...
Description: TASS: ❗️The opposition 'Coalition for Change' will begin protests in Georgia from October 27, one of the leaders said. Preliminary election results in Georgia:▪️Turnout was 58.94%. In the last elections in 2020, this figure reached 56.11%. The head of the Central Election Commission, Giorgi Kalandarishvili, said that the elections were held in a peaceful and calm atmosphere. During the voting, 337 complaints were received; ▪️18 parties applied for seats in parliament, five of them previously overcame the 5% barrier. The ruling party 'Georgian Dream - Democratic Georgia' gains 52.99% of the vote, which approximately corresponds to 90-91 mandates in the parliament of 150 seats; ▪️Executive Secretary of the 'Georgian Dream' Mamuka Mdinaradze admitted that the party expected more from the election results; ▪️The ruling party will be able to single-handedly form a government, but it will not have a constitutional majority to change the basic law;▪️Before the elections, Georgian Dream stated that it needed a coalition majority (113 out of 150 mandates) to recognize Saakashvili’s United National party as unconstitutional movement', which participated in the elections under the name 'Unity - National Movement'; ▪️The opposition has a total of slightly more than 38% of the votes. According to preliminary data, the Coalition for Change receives 11.2% of the votes, Unity - National Movement - 9.83%, Strong Georgia - 9.02%, Gakharia for Georgia party - 8.22%; ▪️General Secretary of the Georgian Dream, Mayor of Tbilisi Kakha Kaladze said that opposition parties do not enjoy the support of the people, they will not be able to stage a coup or revolution in the country; ▪️Kaladze warned that the state 'will follow a very harsh reaction' if anyone... then he will dare to take illegal steps;▪️Saakashvili’s party stated that it does not recognize the election results. The head of the party, Tinatin Bokuchava, called the elections 'stolen'; ▪️The opposition 'Coalition for Change' does not recognize the election results and has begun protests since October 27. This was stated by one of the party leaders, Elene Khoshtaria.

Title: ↩️ The Supreme Court will consider an appeal against the decision...
Description: TASS: The Ministry of Justice of the Russian Federation added the head of the human rights organization Agora, Pavel Chikov, and blogger Ilya Varlamov to the register of foreign agents. In addition, the register includes Svetlana Lada-Rus (Peunova), Ruslan Aisin, Bogdan Bakaleyko and the association of individuals 'Guys Plus/Guys+'. The Supreme Court will consider a complaint against the decision to include in the list of individuals performing the functions of a foreign agent, former member of the Human Rights Council under the President of the Russian Federation Pavel Chikov (recognized as a foreign agent in the Russian Federation). TASS reported this in court.

Title: ↩️ The situation with an almost complete blackout in Cuba is comp...

In many houses in the Cuban capital, water is turned off, eyewitnesses told a TASS correspondent.

Title: ↩️ Publicist Evgeny Ponasenkov (recognized as a foreign agent in ...
Description: TASS: ❗️Ponasenkov (recognized as a foreign agent in the Russian Federation) was unable to achieve exclusion from the register of foreign agents in the Supreme Court. The court refused to consider the blogger's complaint. The court reported this to TASS. Publicist Evgeny Ponasenkov (recognized as a foreign agent in the Russian Federation) was included in the register of foreign agents, among other reasons, because of 30 anti-Russian videos created in Italy under foreign influence, according to court documents available to TASS.

Title: ↩️ The possibility of Cuba joining BRICS as a partner state will....
Description: TASS: Cuba sent an official request to the Russian Federation to join BRICS as a partner country, said Carlos Pereira, Director General for Bilateral Relations of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic. The possibility of Cuba joining BRICS as a partner state will be included in the agenda of the summit, which will be held in Kazan on October 22-24. This was announced by the Director General for Bilateral Relations of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic, Carlos Pereira.

Title: ↩️ The Verkhovna Rada again raised the topic of lowering the mobi...
Description: TASS: The mobilization of men from 18 or 20 years of age is necessary for Ukraine, Rada deputy Roman Kostenko said on the Ukrainian TV channel NTA. The deputy added that he does not understand why, during the most difficult conflict for Ukraine, 'there is a choice of whom to call up.' The Verkhovna Rada again raised the topic of lowering the mobilization age, emphasizing that this is an insistent demand of the American partners. US Congressmen in private conversations express doubts about the existence of problems with mobilization in Ukraine, noted Rada deputy Kostenko.

Title: In the suburbs of Odessa, the head of the Ukrainian voluntary for...
Description: In the suburbs of Odessa, the head of the Ukrainian voluntary formation that helps the security forces mobilize, Gennady Beibutyan, was found murdered. The publication Strana reports this. Members of such formations often also perform the functions of transferring bribes from draft dodgers to military commissars, the publication notes.

Title: 🖼 The Yamuna River, flowing through New Delhi, is covered with a...
